title: Fix the mega lag That is going on RN ATm
body: ranked and blind games laggg like hell

replies.body: If you're running into a lot of lag spikes on both ranked and blind, it might be that there's something making it hard for your network to reliably reach our game servers. We could probably get you running pretty smooth again by checking out some of your [**network settings**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues), but hit us back up if those steps don't get you too far. Make sure to test those changes in a custom or practice game!
